title: Businessweek Weekend Podcast - February 2nd, 2019
itunes:title: Businessweek Weekend Podcast - February 2nd, 2019
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring:-Matthew Campbell details Carlos Ghosn’s arrest-Jeff Muskus brings us the latest on the U.S. fight against Huawei-Peter Coy outlines how threats of a nuclear war are increasing-Plus, highlights from Businessweek’s trip to Atlanta ahead of the big game.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
